name: uptime-maintenance-window
description: Activates or disables Uptime maintenance window for a given Check or list of Checks
author: WalkerScott

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uptime API Key - Can be found at [https://uptime.com/api/tokens](https://uptime.com/api/tokens)

inputs.name: checkIds
inputs.label: Check Id(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uptime Check Ids - if multiple Check Ids are used separate them with a ',' character - can be found on the check's detail page e.g. https://uptime.com/devices/services/637435 (637435 is the Check Id)
